message: Hey there, Phyllis! Per your request, here is the demographic breakdown of our under-21 readers:
survey_details: These results are based on the reader survey conducted in October 1998, using the methodology as described in the documents I faxed to you earlier today.
contact_info: Please feel free to call me with any other questions. I can be reached directly at 323.436.4218.
closing: Again, thanks for considering FLAUNT. And can I still hold our June/July Cover 2/Page 1 for MARLBORO, or should I give it to another advertiser? I want you to have it.
